Vulois/Terminess/Bronco and Octociz

Vulois stepped out of the CR Chamber fresh and revived. He would soon 
get his revenge on Unitron. He saw Battera waiting for him beside the 
chamber. Curious little bot. Won't wait for anything. He spoke to her.

"Come with me to Terminess' lab. I will tell you the plan there."

Vulois than sends a secret com link to Soundwave.

"Go to Terminess' lab. We have important things to discuss."

Vulois starts walking towards the lab.

______________________________________________________________________

Terminess smiled and stared at what she had found.

"Excellent. The pod that I crashed in. The one I used to outwit 
Optimal Optimus. This will be a great start to our ship."

Being a termite, Terminess may carry more than 10x her body weight. 
She easily hauls the pod onto her back and begins walking towards the 
Pred base.

______________________________________________________________________

Brocno laughed at Iron Raptor's transmision. He sent one back.

"Fool! I have nothing left. No family, no love ones, nothing to live 
for. Dieing would just be another part of life. And if you do hunt me 
down, you will become enraged, leaving your judgement  impaired. And 
as you told me, the actual commanders of the Maximals are gone. With 
them gone and you insane, who would lead the Maximals? Who would 
protect them from the Preds? The answer is no one. They would lose 
and they would die! I will give you one more mega-cycle. But since 
you have not arrived, you do not get the full Octociz. Listen to 
this."

Bronco pulled out a machine he had made from scrap parts of his ship 
while Octociz had been unconcios. He stuck to Octociz' chest, and 
began pulling back on the handle. Octociz began screaming. So loud 
that it could be heard through the com-link. In a few moments, the 
shell of Octociz had gone limp and dead. Inside the device was a 
sphere, filled with all sorts of DNAand things like that.

It was the spark of Octociz.

"He will only live for another mega-cycle like this, so you had 
better hurry. And no funny things, because this device is keeping him 
alive. I can pull the plug on him. See you in less than one mega-
cycle."

Bronco shoved the body of Octociz into the sea to be laid to rest 
with the Axalon. He laughed.
